localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.excerpt: Enter a link to any web resource to get a new one that you can schedule to be released at a time of your choice and share it to keep your audience engaged.
blogPost.body: Enter a link to any web resource to get a new one that you can schedule to be released at a time of your choice and share it to keep your audience engaged.
blogPost.title: Urlcast.io - Hide an URL as long as you want
blogPost.author: Daniel Hernández

localize.description: 输入任何网络资源的链接，就可以获得一个新的资源，你可以安排在你选择的时间发布，并分享给你的观众，以保持你的观众参与。
localize.tagline: 只要你想，就可以隐藏一个URL

localize.description: 輸入任何網絡資源的鏈接，就可以獲得一個新的資源，你可以安排在你選擇的時間發佈，並分享給你的觀衆，以保持你的觀衆參與。
localize.tagline: 只要你想，就可以隱藏一個URL

previous.excerpt: Early stage fundraising is hard. Understanding any long-term repercussions make it easier. ⠀ Introducing the Carta SAFE Calculator. ⠀ In just a few clicks you can: -Calculate your future dilution -Compare the impact of pre vs. post money SAFEs
previous.title: Carta SAFE Calculator - Calculate your future dilution in just a few clicks

localize.description: 早期阶段的筹款是很难的。了解任何长期的影响，使其更容易。⠀ 介绍Carta SAFE计算器。⠀ 只需点击几下，您就可以。-计算您的未来稀释 -比较资金前与资金后SAFEs的影响。
localize.tagline: 只需点击几下，就能计算出您未来的稀释率。

localize.description: 早期階段的籌款是很難的。瞭解任何長期的影響，使其更容易。⠀ 介紹Carta SAFE計算器。⠀ 只需點擊幾下，您就可以。-計算您的未來稀釋 -比較資金前與資金後SAFEs的影響。
localize.tagline: 只需點擊幾下，就能計算出您未來的稀釋率。

localize.description: 这篇通讯是用严肃的爱做的。我选择了一些世界上最有趣的独立漫画家并与之合作。这份每日通讯会让你脸上露出笑容。
